name: Content Creation
description: A2A agents for writing, editing, and generating media content. From blog posts to video generation.

agentNotes.a2a-sample-content-writer: Java agent generating original written content from prompts
agentNotes.a2a-sample-content-planner: Plans content strategy, topics, and editorial calendars
agentNotes.a2a-sample-content-editor: Reviews and refines written content for quality and consistency
agentNotes.a2a-sample-veo-video-gen: Generates AI videos using Google Veo video generation model
agentNotes.a2a-storylab: Multi-agent storytelling system demonstrating collaborative content iteration
